songs.title: Die Another Day (Thee RetroLectro Mix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I think I'll find another way
There's so much more to know
I guess I'll die another day
It's not my time to go
I guess I'll die another day
It's not my time to go

[Chorus 1]
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day

[Chorus 2]
I think I'll find another way
There's so much more to know
I guess I'll die another day
It's not my time to go

[Verse 2]
I'm gonna break the cycle
I'm gonna shake up the system
I'm gonna destroy my ego
I'm gonna close my body now

[bridge]
Time to go

[Chorus 1]
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die
Another day
Another day

[Verse 2]
I'm gonna break the cycle
There's so much more to know
I'm gonna destroy my ego
It's not my time to go

[Chorus 1]
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
I guess I'll die another day
Another day
Another day
Another day
Another day
Another day
Another day
Another day
Another day
Another day

[Chorus 2]
I think I'll find another way
There's so much more to know
I guess I'll die another day
It's not my time to go

[Outro]
I guess I'll die another day
It's not my time to go
